text: We've been using AWS for about 10 years.

We've started to use the
AWS generative AI services

and we're using those to
look at how we can
of improve our operations

and help reshape the
business for the future.

We create new data
products quite regularly.

When we create those products,
we need to compare them

to the different regulations
in different regions.
So working with AWS, we utilize some

of the generative AI
services to build a solution,

which allows all this to
be done automatically.
So a process that used to take a person,
maybe a couple months to complete,

we can now complete that
just in a few minutes.

We have sales people that meet
with our clients regularly

and they create notes from
from those meetings,
and they go into a sales database.

We created a solution which
basically looked at all

of the notes and were able
to give us insights into
those interactions.

We are improving the way that
we interact with our clients
because we've got better insight into
what our clients are looking for.

The return on investment's
been significant.
We've gone from software releases

that would take several
hours to now releases
that take several minutes.
People have got more time to sort
of do those higher value tasks
that are really just only now possible
because of these technologies.
